section.title: Overview
section.lines: This page describes the parameter_defaults feature in the Deployment Inventory Tool. It describes the purpose of this feature and how it works at a high level.

section.title: Purpose Of This Feature
section.lines: Download to JSON and YAML features is available on all document view pages. The following Documents: vENM SEDs, VNF LCM SEDs and Managed Configs will have an extra option to download either with parameters or with parameter_defaults. Choosing 'parameter_defaults' option on 'Download to JSON' menu, will put 'parameter_defaults' as the parent name of the JSON object. By default for the download to YAML feature for mentioned Documents above will have 'parameter_defaults', the 'Download to YAML' button will be next the 'Download to JSON' button.
